post_text: February 7, 2018 at 11:32â€¯AM#1Hi !Hope you're enjoying your day !I looked into this amazing forum, unfortunately, I didn't found my goal !Let's assume that I've got 2 dimmers.In the programmer the first dimmer is at "30" and the second one at "closed" because I've tryed it on stage but I dont like it.Only dimmer 1 is selected.Now I want to store only value over "0" or "closed"... title: Storing value>0
